item.title: 6297. Sort the Students by Their Kth Score
item.description: Link: https://leetcode.com/contest/weekly-contest-329/problems/sort-the-students-by-their-kth-score/ Code: # Time Complexity: O(nlogn) # Space Complexity: O(n) from heapq import * class Solution: def sortTheStudents(self, score: List[List[int]], k: int) -> List[List[int]]: maxHeap = [] for i in range (len(score)): heappush(maxHeap, (-score[i][k], i)) result = [] while maxHeap: student_score, i = heappop(maxHeap) result.append(score[i]) return result
